Trade/Device Name(s): Immunofixation Electrophoresis Test using Interlab G26 Instrument
Interlab IFE test using G26 v2.0 Instrument
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins (A, G, M, D, E) Immunological Test Systems
Immunoglobulin (light chain specific) Immunological Test Systems
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Automated Interlab G26 ver. 2 electrophoresis analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Grifols Immunofixation Electrophoresis Test using Interlab G26 v2.0 Instrument for qualitative identification of abnormal immunoglobulins in serum and concentrated urine.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic separation and identification of immunoglobulins (IgG, IgA, IgM) and kappa/lambda chains in human serum and concentrated urine using agarose gel; aids in identifying suspected monoclonal proteins for use with clinical and laboratory findings.
